title: We're sorry to see you go!
headerOne: There are a few things left before we can close your account
itemTwo: Handle any remaining surcharges or credits
footerOne: Our team will send confirmation once your account is fully closed
headerTwo: This account is now closed. All users, including yourself, have been logged out.
footerTwo: If you have any further questions or concerns, the Shippo team is happy to help on support@goshippo.com.
